subject: Implement artifact parsers for checklist items
description:
Create parsers to extract checklist items from each artifact type:
- parseGitHubChecklist(body) - from issue body markdown
- parseOpenSpecTasks(content) - from tasks.md files
- parsePlanChecklist(content) - from plan .md files
- parseClaudeTasks(tasks) - from TaskList output

Location: hooks/src/sync/checklist_parsers.ts
